pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta-CART: A Flexible Approach to Identify Moderators in Meta- Analysis // Fits meta-CART by integrating classification and regression trees (CART) into meta-analysis. Meta-CART is a flexible approach to identify interaction effects between moderators in meta-analysis. The methods are described in Dusseldorp et al. (2014) doi:10.1037/hea0000018 and Li et al. (2017) doi:10.1111/bmsp.12088.
